sentences.pinyin: Zhège píngguǒ de shuǐfèn hěn zú.
sentences.translation: This apple has a high moisture content.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在这个焦炙的夏季，您需要吃水分含量高的食物来补充身体的水分。
sentences.traditionalText: 在這個焦炙的夏季，您需要吃水分含量高的食物來補充身體的水分。
sentences.pinyin: Zài zhège jiāo zhì de xiàjì, nín xūyào chī shuǐfèn hánliàng gāo de shíwù lái bǔchōng shēntǐ de shuǐfèn.
sentences.translation: In this scorching summer, you need to eat food with high moisture content to replenish the body's water.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在炎热的天气里，不足够的水分摄取可能会引起脱水。
sentences.traditionalText: 在炎熱的天氣裡，不足夠的水分攝取可能會引起脫水。
sentences.pinyin: Zài yánrè de tiānqì lǐ, bùzúgòu de shuǐfèn shèqǔ kěnéng huì yǐnqǐ tuōshuǐ.
sentences.translation: In hot weather, insufficient intake of water can lead to dehydration.
